price: Babaları: Eğer onu götürürseniz tasalanırım. Siz ondan habersizken, onu bir kurt yemesinden korkarım, dedi.
arabic: قَالَ إِنِّي لَيَحۡزُنُنِيٓ أَن تَذۡهَبُواْ بِهِۦ وَأَخَافُ أَن يَأۡكُلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُ وَأَنتُمۡ عَنۡهُ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla innī layaḥzununī an tadhhabū bihi wa-akhāfu an yakulahu al-dhi'bu wa-antum ʿanhu ghāfilūna
